name: Idle Champions: Classic Demogorgon Familiar Pack
summary: In this pack: Classic Demogorgon Familiar Sketch Skin for Demogorgon Familiar 6 Epic Potions of Speed 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter 2000 Modron Component Pieces 1 Potion of Polish
